span.span: Enables the for an endpoint through configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為 子型別，可透過組態用來包含端點上的 。The is a subtype that can be used to include the on an endpoint through configuration. 此項目上沒有可設定的屬性。There are no configurable properties on this element. 接著會允許 ASP.NET AJAX 網頁在已使用 設定之後存取端點。The , in turn, allows an endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web pages when it is configured with the . [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 如何啟用[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]服務回應 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端，請參閱[建立 ASP.NET AJAX 的 WCF 服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md)。 how to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md). ## Examples 下列為使用此組態項目設定讓 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 端點可由 ASP.NET AJAX 網頁存取的範例。The following is an example of using this configuration element to configure a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web page. ``` ```
